3 Clément 3.1 About Me Hello, I am Clément. I am a Doctoral researcher and Scientific Assistant at the Center of Economic Research (CER), ETH, since September 2018. 3.2 My Research Part of my research focuses on the impact of tropical cyclones on the economy. We try to integrate advances from climate studies into the economic growth theory. Figure 1 is an old screenshot of my research. (I do not want to spoil too much of the final results!) Figure 1: Screenshot of my research I also work on the implementation of interlinked (climate) shocks in economic models and mitigation policies. Finally, I also do work on economic inequalities related to carbon taxation.
